commands.igtips.tip.unknown: The tip %s does not exist. Make sure you are using the correct name and ensure that's loaded on the server.
tip.igtips.name: Tip
config.igtips.main.title: In-Game Tips Options
config.igtips.client.title: Client Options
config.igtips.client.option.tips_enabled: Enables or disables the display of tips. If this option is deactivated, tips received from the server will not be displayed, but will always be marked as having been viewed.
config.igtips.client.option.sound_enable: Enables or disables the sound that plays when a new tip is received.
config.igtips.client.option.max_lines.to: Sets the maximum number of lines that can be displayed in a tip. If a tip exceeds this limit, it will be truncated.
config.igtips.common.option.schedule_tim:
Sets the time in seconds between each tip. If the value is set to 0, the tips won't be sent automatically.

Example: 60 (1 minute), 90 (1 minute 30 seconds), 300 (5 minutes)
